meanings: (가난·구속 등에서) free (sb from sth), break away (from), rid oneself of
(요점·주제 등을) be off the point, be beside the point

vlive.korean: [벗어나고 싶은 공공칠빵의 늪] - 공, 공, 칠, 빵! - 으악! [Swamp of 007 bang] - 007 bang! - Ugh! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.94
그래서 벗어나고 싶은데... - 왜요? That's why I want to escape that... - Why? 듣기 View video JBJ95 : JBJ95 Showcase 'AWAKE'
vlive.english: That's why I want to escape that... - Why?

vlive.korean: 지금 상황에서 좀 잠깐 벗어나고 새로 리프레시... Kind of stepping out from the current situation and doing a new refresh... 듣기 View video Apink : 난아침
vlive.english: Kind of stepping out from the current situation and doing a new refresh...

vlive.korean: 저도 이제 탈색 머리에서 좀 벗어나고 싶습니다. I want to escape from bleached hair now. 듣기 View video THE SHOW(더쇼) : SBS MTV <더쇼> 퇴근길 Live !
vlive.english: I want to escape from bleached hair now.

vlive.korean: 월요일의 답답함, 빨리 벗어나고 싶은 - 도심 속... The frustration you feel on Mondays... - How you want to get away from the city... 듣기 View video EXO : [FULL] 화요일은 첸백시! (EXO-CBX's Blooming Day!)
vlive.english: The frustration you feel on Mondays... - How you want to get away from the city...

examples.korean: We’re getting right off the subject. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 주제에서 아주 멀리 벗어나고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re getting right off the subject. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’d like to escape the office treadmill. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 사무실의 다람쥐 쳇바퀴 같은 일에서 벗어나고 싶다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d like to escape the office treadmill. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He wanted to rid himself of the burden of the secret. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 비밀의 부담에서 벗어나고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He wanted to rid himself of the burden of the secret. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Are you trying to say you want rid of me? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신 지금 내게서 벗어나고 싶다는 말을 하려는 거예요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Are you trying to say you want rid of me? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She wanted to be rid of her parents and their authority. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 부모와 그들의 권위에서 벗어나고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to be rid of her parents and their authority. Add to Wordbook
